    setSimulationParameters(int, int, int) - Method in class org.wildloop.SimulationPanel
    Configures simulation parameters by setting simulated world dimensions, initializing grid for graphical interface and populating simulation with prey and predator type animals based on given numbers.

    Panel responsible for displaying and managing simulation
    SimulationPanel - Class in org.wildloop
    Represents the main graphical user interface for the simulation, consisting of a grid-based world inhabited by predators and prey, and provides controls for managing and displaying the simulation state.
    SimulationPanel(StartApp) - Constructor for class org.wildloop.SimulationPanel
    Constructor for a simulation panel in the application.
    sizeField - Variable in class org.wildloop.StartApp
    Text field for entering simulation world size
    SOUTH - Enum constant in enum class org.wildloop.Direction
    Southern direction (down), vector (0,1)
    startApp - Variable in class org.wildloop.SimulationPanel
    Reference to the main application, used for communication between components
    StartApp - Class in org.wildloop
    Extends JFrame and serves as the main user interface container for the application.
    StartApp() - Constructor for class org.wildloop.StartApp
    Creates a new application window and initializes all interface components.
    startSimulation() - Method in class org.wildloop.SimulationPanel
    Starts simulation by initializing or resetting the necessary components and launching the main simulation loop.
    statsLabel - Variable in class org.wildloop.SimulationPanel
    Label displaying current simulation statistics
    stopSimulation() - Method in class org.wildloop.SimulationPanel
    Stops simulation by stopping timer and resetting pause state.
